title: Last Will: The Taboo Clause
description: After the death of the long-lost Kermit, the Caudills are unexpectedly invited to the reading of the will. That's when they hear of a they stand to inherit $1 billion, but on one condition.They have to commit a TABOO act!Old man Kermit had a peculiar lifestyle and he intends for it to endure. Will Ben and Cheryl be okay with this? Are the INNOCENT and UNTOUCHED Marissa and Tommy going to accept what this entails?They have one week to discuss the situation, to discover if money is worth more than the forbidden taboo. And a lot can happen in one week...* This story is so wild that I can't go into details here. Click the cover to check out the sample for the full juicy description! *
author: Cheri Verset
